name: Wrench Master
description:
This project was made as unofficial GlobalGameJam2020 entry made by team of two:

Kafeigintou https://twitter.com/kafekafe7

Zer0Frost https://twitter.com/Zer0sWorkshop

As their first step into gamedev...

Story:
Dirty agile forest monsters want to destroy Your cultural monument and all turrets have jammed! HURRY repair turrets and repel knife-ears

Contorls:

Rotate camera: Mouse

Movement: W A S D

Unjam turret: F/LMB
